SELECT p.popup_id ,p.title ,p.start_date ,p.end_date, p.address,p.role, img.image_file_name AS thumbnail FROM popup_tbl p LEFT JOIN (SELECT popup_id, image_file_name FROM popup_image_tbl WHERE (popup_id, popup_image_id) IN (SELECT popup_id, MIN(popup_image_id) FROM popup_image_tbl GROUP BY popup_id)) img ON p.popup_id = img.popup_id WHERE p.role ="승인" and p.end_date > NOW() ORDER BY p.hits DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT h.hash_tag, COUNT(ph.popup_id) AS usage_count FROM hash_tag_tbl h JOIN popup_hash_tag_tbl ph ON h.hash_tag_id = ph.hash_tag_id JOIN popup_tbl p ON ph.popup_id = p.popup_id WHERE p.role = '승인' GROUP BY h.hash_tag_id, h.hash_tag ORDER BY usage_count DESC LIMIT 5; -- 원하는 개수로 조정

SELECT p.popup_id, p.title, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.address,p.role, MAX(i.image_file_name) AS image_file_name FROM popup_tbl p JOIN popup_hash_tag_tbl ph ON p.popup_id = ph.popup_id JOIN hash_tag_tbl h ON ph.hash_tag_id = h.hash_tag_id LEFT JOIN popup_image_tbl i ON p.popup_id = i.popup_id WHERE h.hash_tag = #{hash_tag} and p.role = "승인" GROUP BY p.popup_id, p.title, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.address ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;
